translation.en: "Childhood is not from birth to a certain age."
translation.ko: 어린 시절은 몇 살까지로 정해진 게 아니다

translation.en: "And at a certain age, the child is grown and puts away childish things."
translation.ko: 어느 정도 자라면 아이는 아이다움을 버리게 된다

translation.en: "Childhood is the kingdom where nobody dies."
translation.ko: 어린 시절은 아무도 죽지 않는 왕국이다

translation.en: You just have to break them in.
I've been breaking them in. For three days.
Just thinking it's a little much, you know?
The dress and the shoes... ...and all of this.
Where do you want them, boss?
On either side of the aisle.
- What aisle? - Does no one have vision?
translation.ko: 무슨 통로? 다들 그림이 안 그려져?

translation.en: You, go home and get lots of beauty sleep.
translation.ko: 넌 이제 집에 가서 푹 자도록 해

translation.en: l was just checking for cold feet.
It's not too late to change your mind.
What? Now you're having second thoughts?
No, I've been waiting a century to marry you, Miss Swan.
translation.ko: 난 너랑 결혼하려고 100년을 기다렸어, 스완 양

translation.en: l haven't told you everything about myself.
translation.ko: 나에 대해 못 한 얘기가 있어

translation.en: Look, you can't scare me away now.
Look, a few years after Carlisle created me...
translation.ko: 칼라일이 날 만들고 나서 몇 년 후에

translation.en: l resented him for curbing my appetite.
And so for a while, l went off on my own.
l wanted to know how it felt to hunt.
You probably saved more lives than you took.
translation.ko: 네가 뺏은 목숨보다 살린 목숨이 더 많을 거야

translation.en: Bella, that's what l told myself.
But they were all human beings.
l looked into their eyes as they died and l saw who l was...
translation.ko: 죽어 가는 그들의 눈을 보며 내가 어떤 존재인지 깨달았지

translation.en: And what I'll be capable of.
translation.ko: 내가 뭘 할 수 있을지도 알겠네

translation.en: Why are you telling me this tonight?
Did you really think this was going to change my mind about you?
translation.ko: 이러면 너에 대한 마음이 바뀔 줄 알았어?

translation.en: l just wondered if it would change your mind about yourself...
translation.ko: 너 자신에 대한 마음이 바뀔까 싶어서

translation.en: ...and who you want to see when you look in the mirror a year from now.
translation.ko: 1년 후에 거울을 통해 보고 싶은 모습도

translation.en: l know l can do this.
You should give yourself some credit for that.
Now, hopefully, a year from now...
...I am going to look in the mirror and see someone like you.
l mean, someone capable of courage and sacrifice and love.
translation.ko: 용기를 낼 줄 알고 자신을 희생할 줄 알고 사랑을 아는...

translation.en: - Come on! Let's go! - I am late for my bachelor party.
translation.ko: - 뭐야? - 얼른 가자고! 총각 파티에 늦었거든

translation.en: Send him out, Bella, or we're coming in after him.
translation.ko: 그 녀석 보내 줘, 벨라 안 그러면 우리도 들어간다

translation.en: No, just a couple of mountain lions. Maybe a few bears.
translation.ko: 아냐, 퓨마 두어 마리랑 곰 몇 마리뿐일걸

translation.en: Don't worry, Bella, we'll give him back in plenty of time.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 벨라 일찌감치 반납할 테니까

translation.en: Ok, go, before they break my house.
translation.ko: 가 봐, 우리 집 다 부수겠다

translation.en: I'll meet you at the altar.
I'll be the one in white.
What did l say about beauty sleep?

translation.ko: - 내가 푹 자라고 했지? - 미안해 악몽을 꿨거든

translation.en: Please. I am not offended by your choice of groom.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 네 신랑 선택에 불만 없으니까

translation.en: Just my blatant lack of respect for mortality.
translation.ko: 죽음이라는 특권을 쉽게 보는 게 불만이겠지

translation.en: Hey, so, did you find our daughter?
You sure? l don't want to...
We thought you needed something blue.
- lt was Grandmother Swan's. - But we added the sapphires.
translation.ko: 네 할머니 거였어 거기 사파이어를 추가했지

translation.en: Pass on to your daughter, and her daughter.
translation.ko: 네 딸한테 물려줘 그 딸의 딸한테도
안 돼, 내 걸작이 번지면 곤란해

translation.en: Do you want to see it? l want to see it!
They have got to be related.
So, you think Bella's going to be showing?
Ok. Who else gets married at 18?
Just don't let me fall, Dad.
Ladies and gentlemen, we are gathered here on this glorious day...
translation.ko: 여러분, 우린 이 영광스러운 날 이 자리에 함께 모여

translation.en: ...to witness the union of Edward Cullen and Bella Swan.
translation.ko: 에드워드 컬렌과 벨라 스완의 결합을 지켜보고자 합니다

translation.en: -Take you, Bella Swan. -To have and to hold.
translation.ko: 벨라 스완을 아내로 맞아 늘 곁에서 감싸 주고

translation.en: As long as we both shall live.
Just thought it'd be bigger. Yeah.
We were just saying how pretty everything is, you know, just saying.
translation.ko: 다 너무 예쁘다는 얘기를 하고 있었어

translation.en: Well, thanks so much. You don't think it's too much?
translation.ko: 고마워, 좀 과한 것 같진 않아?

translation.en: - I am happy for you. - Thank you.
l hope you'll be happy, Bella. Thank you, Billy.
I am sure Jake wishes you the best.
Well, l plan on getting drunk.
They're serving up some pretty fancy champagne.
translation.ko: 엄청 비싼 샴페인을 주던데 어때요, 수?

translation.en: Sue, can l get you a glass?
Yes, and these are our cousins from Alaska.
- Tanya, Kate. - We've heard so much about you.
- l can't do this. - You promised.
He wanted to be like us.
To live in peace with humans. With me.
translation.ko: 인간과 평화롭게 지내려 했다고 나와 함께

translation.en: Let's not monopolize the bride. Congratulations.
translation.ko: 신부를 독차지하면 안 되지 - 축하해요 - 감사해요

translation.en: Well, what's a wedding without some family drama?
translation.ko: 가족 간의 갈등이 없으면 결혼식이 아니지

translation.en: Umm, I'd like to propose a toast.
Bella, I hope you've gotten enough sleep these last 18 years.
translation.ko: 벨라, 지난 18년 동안 충분히 잤기를 바라

translation.en: Because you won't be getting any more for a while.
Well, Bella was just like everybody else, totally mesmerized by Edward.
translation.ko: 벨라도 다른 친구들과 똑같았죠 에드워드한테 완전히 반했었어요

translation.en: Or "The Hair," as l call him.
And then, suddenly... ...Edward is all about Bella.
translation.ko: 그런데 갑자기 에드워드가 벨라한테 빠진 거예요

translation.en: Even though she's not the captain of the volleyball team.
I am just kidding. I am just kidding.
Or the president of the student council.
Edward will be a good husband.
I know this because I am a cop.
Like how to hunt somebody to the ends of the Earth.
translation.ko: 누군가를 세상 끝까지 추적해서 잡는 법 같은 거요

translation.en: ...you'll have to get over your aversion to fashion.
And I know how to use a gun.
I'd like to thank Renne and Charlie...
...for bringing such a wonderful person into the world and into our lives.
translation.ko: 벨라처럼 멋진 사람을 낳아 주고 저희에게 보내 주셨잖아요

translation.en: We will cherish and protect her forever.
...to meet someone who you can bare your soul to.
translation.ko: 제가 어떤 존재든 받아들여 줄 사람을 만나는 건

translation.en: And who will accept you for what you are.
I've been waiting, what seems like a very long time...
translation.ko: 전 아주 오랫동안 제 한계를 뛰어넘기를

translation.en: ...I feel like I can finally begin.
So I'd like to propose a toast to my beautiful bride.
translation.ko: 제 아름다운 신부를 위해 건배하고 싶습니다

translation.en: No measure of time with you will be long enough.
translation.ko: 시간이 아무리 많아도 너와 함께하기엔 늘 부족할 거야

translation.en: Another one of your gifts just arrived. What?
What's a wedding present doing out here?
translation.ko: 결혼 선물이 왜 이런 데 있어?

translation.en: The best man didn't have time to get a tux.
I'll see if Rosalie wants to dance.
I am sorry I am late.
We were going to put your face on a milk carton.
translation.ko: 우유 팩에 미아 찾기 광고를 낼 뻔했어

translation.en: It's weird to be back on two legs again, in clothes.
translation.ko: 다시 옷을 입고 두 다리로 서 있으려니 어색하네

translation.en: Gotten out of practice with the whole human thing.
Why? Afraid I'll trash your party?
You'd think I'd be used to telling you goodbye by now.
translation.ko: 작별을 고하는 데 익숙해질 때도 됐는데

translation.en: Come on, you're not supposed to be the one crying, Bella.
translation.ko: 이러지 마 울고 싶은 건 나라고, 벨라

translation.en: This is how I am going to remember you.
Because what, soon I am going to be dead to you?
I am just trying to appreciate your last night as a human.
translation.ko: 네가 인간으로 보내는 마지막 밤을 간직하고 싶었어

translation.en: Well, it's not my last night.
l didn't really want to spend my honeymoon writhing in pain.
It's not like you're goin to have a real honeymoon with him, anyway.
It's going to be as real as anyone else's. That's a sick joke.
translation.ko: - 남들과 똑같이 보낼 거야 - 농담이 지나치네

translation.en: You can't be serious, Bella. Tell me you're not that stupid.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 벨라 너 이렇게까지 바보였어?

translation.en: l mean, it's really none of your business.
- No! You can't do this! - Jake.
- Listen to me, Bella. - Jake, let me go!
translation.ko: - 내 말 들어, 벨라 - 제이크, 이거 놔!

translation.en: Are you out of your mind? Huh? You'll kill her!
You're not going to start something that we'll have to finish.
I am really, really, really stupid.
Come on, people are probably missing us. Let's go back.
So, he really won't tell you where he's taking you?
translation.ko: 어디로 가는지 진짜 말 안 해 준대?

translation.en: Take care of yourself. l will.
Everything's packed and ready to go.
- I am going to see him. - Yeah.
It's going to be strange... ...you not living under my roof.
translation.ko: 낯설 것 같구나 네가 우리 집에 없다니

translation.en: Yeah. It's going to be strange for me, too.
You know it will always be your home, right?
l love you, too, Bells. l always have and l always will.
translation.ko: 나도 사랑한다, 벨 늘 그랬고 앞으로도 그럴 거야

translation.en: You don't want to miss your plane.
So, we're not staying in Rio?
lt was a gift from Carlisle.
l am nothing if not traditional.
You want to take a look around?
Do you want to go for a swim?
l could use a few human minutes.
Don't take too long, Mrs. Cullen.
Bella, l can't tell you how sorry l am.
Really, I am not. I am fine. Don't say you're fine.
Why can't you see how perfectly happy l am?
translation.ko: 내가 얼마나 행복한지는 왜 못 봐?

translation.en: l mean, now I am sort of pissed off, actually.
You should be angry with me.
l mean, we knew this was going to be tricky, right?
l mean, it was amazing for me.
l know it's not the same for you...
...but for a human, l can't imagine that it gets any better than that.
translation.ko: 인간으로서는 상상조차 하기 힘들 만큼 좋았어

translation.en: Last night... ...was the best night of my existence.
You're not going to touch me again, are you?
You know that's not what l mean.
lt was a really good dream.
Because l wanted it to be real.
Maybe they'll say she was in a car crash.
Or tripped and fell off a cliff.
Keep it in play! Keep it in play!
At least I'll get one thing out of it.
Cullens are not a danger to the town or the tribe.
translation.ko: 컬렌가는 마을이나 우리 종족을 위협하지 않아

translation.en: Well, he's either going to kill her or change her.
translation.ko: 그 녀석은 벨라를 죽이거나 변화시킬 거야

translation.en: - And the treaty says-- - l say, Jacob.
You know, if you wanted things different, you should've become alpha.
Turning it down seemed like a good idea at the time.
translation.ko: 그땐 거절하는 게 옳은 것 같았어

translation.en: Jake, you really think you could kill Bella if she comes back a vampire?
translation.ko: 제이크, 벨라가 뱀파이어가 되면 - 진짜 죽일 수 있겠어? - 그럴 리가

translation.en: No, make one of us do it, then hold a grudge against us.
translation.ko: 우리 중 한 명한테 시키고 원한을 품겠지

translation.en: Would you just get over it? It's not like you've imprinted on her.
translation.ko: 이제 집착 좀 버려 걔한테 각인된 것도 아니잖아

translation.en: Yeah, some people are just lucky, l guess.
None of them belong to themselves anymore.
translation.ko: 이제 저 녀석들은 절대 자유롭지 못해

translation.en: And the sickest part is their genes tell them they're happy about it.
translation.ko: 제일 역겨운 건 그게 행복하다고 믿는 거지

translation.en: Least if you imprinted on someone, you'd finally forget about Bella.
translation.ko: 누군가에게 각인되면 적어도 벨라는 잊게 되겠지

translation.en: l mean, being any kind of happy is better than being miserable...
translation.ko: 솔직히 어떤 종류의 행복이든 가질 수 없는 사람 때문에 비참한 것보단 낫잖아
가질 수 없는 사람 때문에 비참한 것보단 낫잖아

translation.en: Bella, these are our housekeepers, Gustavo and Kaure.
translation.ko: 벨라, 청소를 맡아 주실 구스타부랑 카우리야

translation.en: Well, l guess we just leave them to it.
Because l have you here all alone.
You mean she knows about you?
She's native Ticuna. They have legends about blood-drinking demons...
translation.ko: 티쿠나족 원주민인데 그 부족 전설에 피를 마시는 악마가

translation.en: You don't need to see this.
lt must have been the chicken.
How many days has it been since the wedding?
Will you tell me what's going on?

translation.ko: - 앨리스, 뭘 봤는데? - 칼라일 바꿔 줄게

translation.en: - Here's Carlisle. - Bella, what's going on?
translation.ko: - 앨리스, 뭘 봤는데? - 칼라일 바꿔 줄게 벨라, 무슨 일이니?

translation.en: l don't know. I am a little worried. Can vampires go into shock?
translation.ko: 좀 걱정되네요 뱀파이어도 쇼크 상태에 빠지나요?

translation.en: l know that it's impossible, but l think that I am pregnant.
translation.ko: 불가능하다는 거 알지만 저 임신한 것 같아요

translation.en: Carlisle, l swear, something just moved inside me.
translation.ko: 칼라일, 방금 제 배 속에서 뭔가가 움직였어요

translation.en: - ls this even possible? - I don't know.
The sooner Bella's here, the sooner we can find out what it is.
translation.ko: 벨라가 빨리 올수록 빨리 알아볼 수 있겠지

translation.en: I need you to get to the mainland at once.
Kaure's making sure you're still alive.
translation.ko: 네가 살아 있는지 카우리가 보러 왔어

translation.en: What did you do with her?
What do you know about this?
l know that you are a demon!
Her people have legends. She might have seen this before.
translation.ko: 이 부족 전설이야 이런 걸 본 적 있나 봐

translation.en: Please. Tell me how to help her.
l am begging you. l will do anything.
translation.ko: 제발 알려 주세요, 뭐든 다 할게요

translation.en: Tell me how she can survive this.
translation.ko: 어떻게 해야 살 수 있는지 알려 주세요

translation.en: I am not going to let it hurt you.
Carlisle will get that thing out.
- What's going on? - l need your help.
Hey, haven't seen you in a while.
- You ok? - So, you finally heard from Bella?
They want to wait until she feels better before they travel.
Yeah, she told me not to worry, but she sounded...
Listen, just give it to me straight.
-She's here? -They came home two weeks ago.
Yeah, it's nice to see you, too.
So, are you going to tell me what's wrong with you?
translation.ko: 무슨 일인지 말해 줄 수 있어?

translation.en: Rose, you want to help me up?
We didn't know it was even possible.
- What is it? - I am not sure.
Ultrasounds and needles won't penetrate the embryonic sac.
translation.ko: 초음파와 피하 주사로는 접근이 안 돼

translation.en: And l can't see Bella's future anymore.
We've been researching legends, but there isn't much to go on.
translation.ko: 전설들을 조사 중인데 별다른 게 없어

translation.en: What we do know is that it's strong. And fast-growing.
Why haven't you done anything? Take it out of her!
translation.ko: 왜 조치를 안 취했죠? 빼내면 되잖아요!

translation.en: This is none of your business, dog.
translation.ko: - 넌 상관하지 마, 늑대 자식아 - 로즈!

translation.en: All this fighting isn't good for Bella.
The fetus isn't good for Bella.
translation.ko: 벨라한테 안 좋은 건 저 태아죠

translation.en: Say the word, Alice. "Baby." It's just a little baby.
translation.ko: 제대로 말해, 앨리스 아기야 그냥 작은 아기라고!

translation.en: Carlisle, you've got to do something.
It's not his decision. It's not any of yours.
Jacob, l need to talk to you.
l always knew you'd destroy her.
She thinks Carlisle can turn her at the last minute...
translation.ko: 벨라는 최후의 순간에 칼라일이 자길 변화시켜 줄 거라 믿어

translation.en: ...like he did for me and Esme.
Look, Jacob, l need you to do something for me.
You have a connection with her that I'll never understand.
translation.ko: 너랑 벨라 사이에는 내가 이해 못 할 유대감이 있지

translation.en: Maybe you could talk to her, change her mind.
translation.ko: 벨라가 마음을 바꾸도록 네가 설득해 봐

translation.en: - So, Edward sent you in here to talk to me? - Sort of.
translation.ko: - 에드워드가 날 설득해 보래? - 그런 셈이지

translation.en: Though l can't figure out why he thinks you'd listen to me.
translation.ko: 왜 내 말을 들을 거라고 생각하는지 모르겠네

translation.en: l mean, you never have before.
Since when are you and blondie BFFs?
l know this seems like a scary thing...
translation.ko: 무서운 일로 보일 거란 거 아는데...

translation.en: It's like this miracle or something.
So, it's a bouncing baby boy.
I am sorry l didn't know. Should've brought some blue balloons.
When l picture him, l see a boy.
- I am strong enough. - Come on.
You can spout that crap to your bloodsucker, but you don't fool me.
translation.ko: 네 흡혈귀한테는 통했는지 몰라도 나한테는 안 통해

translation.en: l can see what that thing's doing to you. It's a killer, Bella.
translation.ko: 난 그게 너한테 무슨 짓을 하는지 안다고 그건 살인마야, 벨라

translation.en: - You're wrong. - And when you die...
translation.ko: 그렇지 않아 네가 죽으면 다 무슨 소용이야?

translation.en: ...what was the point? Of me loving you, you loving him.
translation.ko: 네가 죽으면 다 무슨 소용이야? 내가 널 사랑하고 네가 그놈을 사랑한 게

translation.en: How is that right for anyone? Because l sure don't see it.
translation.ko: 네가 죽으면 누구한테 좋은데? 난 도무지 모르겠거든

translation.en: Jake, everything's going to be ok.
And I am not sticking around to watch.
Jacob! Jake, I can do this. I can do this.
translation.ko: - 제이크, 나 할 수 있어 - 제이컵!

translation.en: Don't do this. I am strong enough. I am strong enough.
This is none of your business, dog.
Everything's going to be ok. The fetus isn't good for Bella.
translation.ko: - 다 잘될 거야 - 벨라한테 안 좋은 건 저 태아죠

translation.en: Don't you even care that it's killing you?
- Is it true, Jacob? - What will it be?
- Monstrosity. - An abomination. On our land.
- We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
translation.ko: - 그냥 둘 순 없어 - 그냥 둘 순 없어

translation.en: - We can't allow it. - We can't allow it.
translation.ko: - 그냥 둘 순 없어 - 그냥 둘 순 없어

translation.en: We have to protect the tribe.
What they've bred won't be able to control its thirst.
translation.ko: 그들이 잉태한 존재는 갈증을 통제하지 못할 거야

translation.en: Every human will be in danger.
- We're ready. - No time to waste.
We must destroy it before it's born.
Bella's human. Our protection applies to her.
translation.ko: 벨라는 인간이야 우리 보호 대상에 포함된다고

translation.en: We have real enemies to fight tonight.
translation.ko: 싸우고 싶으면 오늘 밤에 실컷 싸워

translation.en: You will fight with us, Jake.
I am the grandson of Ephraim Black.
I am the grandson of a chief!
I wasn't born to follow you, or anyone else.
translation.ko: 난 널 따를 운명이 아니야 그 누구도 따르지 않아

translation.en: Don't worry. They're not following us.
What do you think you're doing here?
- l left Sam's pack. - Go home, Seth.
translation.ko: - 나 샘의 무리에서 나왔어 - 돌아가, 세스

translation.en: - l won't stand behind him. - Oh, yes, you will.
I am not kidding. Get out of here.
ls that an order? Going to make me bow down, too?

translation.ko: 난 명령 같은 거 안 해

translation.en: Look, I am just going off on my own here, ok?
Great, and I've got your back.
...are you really ready to fight your own brothers?
If it's the right thing to do.
I am going to go give the Cullens a heads-up.
How cool is this? Two-man pack. Two against the world.
translation.ko: 완전 멋지잖아 2인조 무리라니 둘이서 세상에 맞서는 거야

translation.en: You're getting on my nerves, Seth.
They're not going to touch her. Agreed.
Man, l can smell them from all the way out here.
translation.ko: 이렇게 먼 데도 저 녀석들 냄새가 나네

translation.en: What the hell are you doing here?
I am not going to let my little brother get himself killed.
translation.ko: 내 동생이 죽게 둘 순 없잖아

translation.en: Go away, Leah! l can take care of myself.
translation.ko: 꺼져, 리아! 내 일은 내가 알아서 해

translation.en: That you think so proves you need a babysitter.
Ok, would the both of you shut up?
Sam doesn't even know l left.
l think he just figured it out.
l know what his plan is.
Sam's lost the element of surprise...
...and he doesn't want to take you on outnumbered...
...so he's not going to come at you head on.
He's got the place surrounded and he'll wait for his opportunity.
We won't get through without a fight.
We won't be the ones to break the treaty.
The treaty is void, at least in Sam's mind.
translation.ko: 조약은 무효가 됐어요 적어도 샘의 생각은 그래요

translation.en: Carlisle, no one's hunted for weeks.
translation.ko: 칼라일, 몇 주째 사냥을 못 했어요

translation.en: You've done us a great service, Jacob.
l know they're out there somewhere, but l can't hear them anymore.
translation.ko: 분명히 저기 어딘가에 있는데 이제 목소리가 안 들려

translation.en: l stopped hearing them, too, the second l decided to leave.
translation.ko: 나도 안 들리더라 떠나기로 마음먹은 순간부터

translation.en: You know you can't stay here.
- But l don't have any place... - l can't trust you with the Cullens.
translation.ko: - 달리 갈 데가... - 널 컬렌가에 둘 순 없어

translation.en: You don't even like me. l don't have to.
translation.ko: - 나도 안 좋아하고 - 좋아할 필요는 없지

translation.en: l just have to follow you.
Look, Seth doesn't want you here. Neither do l.
translation.ko: 세스는 네가 여기 있는 걸 싫어해 나도 그렇고

translation.en: Being unwanted isn't exactly a new thing for me.
translation.ko: 내가 환영받지 못하는 게 하루 이틀 일인가?

translation.en: Look, I'll stay out of your way.
...except go back to Sam's pack and be the pathetic ex-girlfriend he can't get away from.
translation.ko: 샘의 무리로 돌아가서 전 남친 발목 잡는 한심한 애가 되라는 것만 빼고

translation.en: You don't know how many times l wished l could imprint on someone.
translation.ko: 누군가한테 각인될 수 있기를 얼마나 바랐는지 몰라

translation.en: I am going to do a perimeter run. You got my flank?
But there are no splinters. You haven't punctured anything.
translation.ko: 쪼개진 곳은 없구나 - 장기를 찌르지는 않았어 - 아직은 그렇죠
- 장기를 찌르지는 않았어 - 아직은 그렇죠 에드워드

translation.en: It's crushing you from the inside out.
Carlisle, tell her what you told me. Tell her.
translation.ko: 저한테 했던 얘기 들려주세요 벨라한테 들려줘요

translation.en: Carlisle, tell me. It's all right.
The fetus isn't compatible with your body.
lt won't allow you to get the nutrition you need.
It's starving you by the hour. l can't stop it, and l can't slow it down.
translation.ko: 널 굶어 죽게 만들고 있는데 그걸 막거나 늦출 수가 없어

translation.en: At this rate, your heart will give out before you can deliver.
translation.ko: 이 속도면 출산 전에 네 심장이 멎을 거야

translation.en: Then I'll hold on as long as l can, and then...
There are some conditions that even venom can't overcome.
translation.ko: 우리 독으로도 어쩌지 못하는 증상이 있어

translation.en: You won't. You're going to have a part of me.
Do you honestly think that l could love it or even tolerate it if it killed you?
translation.ko: 내가 사랑하긴커녕 그걸 견딜 수나 있을 것 같아? 그게 널 죽여도?

translation.en: You have to accept what is.
Because you've given me no choice!
Bella, we're supposed to be partners, remember?
But you decided this on your own. You've decided to leave me.
translation.ko: 근데 너 혼자 결정했지 날 떠나기로 말이야

translation.en: Well, l have no other way to see it.
Because it's me who'll lose you.
Washington driving in the red zone.
Almost stripped of the ball. He stood up and Calvin finally...
translation.ko: 공을 뺏을 뻔했네요 일어섰습니다, 마침내 캘빈이...

translation.en: Smile like I am your favorite person in the world.
translation.ko: 세상에서 내가 제일 좋다는 듯이 웃는 거

translation.en: Feels complete when you're here, Jake.
translation.ko: 네가 있으니까 다 채워진 느낌이야, 제이크

translation.en: We need to find a way to get some food into her system.
translation.ko: 어떻게든 음식을 먹일 방법을 찾아야 해

translation.en: - If l could only see the fetus... - The baby.
translation.ko: - 내가 태아만 볼 수 있으면... - 아기라고

translation.en: ...maybe l could figure out what it wants.
translation.ko: 걔가 원하는 걸 알 수 있을 텐데

translation.en: lt wasn't an idea. lt was a snide comment.
translation.ko: 아이디어를 낸 게 아니라 비꼰 건데

translation.en: That it's probably just looking for someone to sink its teeth into.
translation.ko: 이를 박아 넣고 피를 빨 상대를 찾는 걸지도 모른다고요

translation.en: If it's craving, it's not going to want animal blood.
translation.ko: 저 정도면 동물 피를 원하진 않을 텐데

translation.en: l have some O negative laid aside for Bella.
translation.ko: 벨라를 위해 보관해 둔 O형 피가 있어

translation.en: You're going to make her drink that?
It's the fastest way to test the theory.
Only if you're comfortable with it.
l think I am going to be sick.
This might make it a little easier to take.
Your pulse is already getting stronger.
- Well, you sound better. l am.
This whole thing must've put a kink in the honeymoon, huh?
Otherwise, married life treating you ok?
translation.ko: 아픈 것 말고는 결혼 생활이 즐겁니?

translation.en: Edward still walks on water and all that?
Yeah, but, l mean, it is different now.
translation.ko: - 에드워드는 여전히 완벽하고? - 네 근데 예전과 조금 달라요

translation.en: The important thing is that you're better.
And that you're coming home soon, right?
Ok, Dad, l don't want you to freak out...
...but I am going to a medical center in Switzerland.
translation.ko: 저 스위스에 있는 의료 센터에 가려고요

translation.en: What? No, no, you're not. You're not going to Switzerland.
translation.ko: 뭐? 말도 안 돼 스위스를 왜 가?

translation.en: What are you... You said you were better.
No, Bella. I am getting on a plane. No.
translation.ko: 안 되겠다 지금 비행기 타러 갈 거야

translation.en: It's really more of a spa.
translation.ko: 말이 의료 센터지 스파 같은 곳이에요

translation.en: And I am sure that I'd be better by the time you got there anyway.
translation.ko: 아빠가 도착하실 때쯤에는 이미 다 나았을 거고요

translation.en: ...like I am sitting on the couch with you, eating pizza or something.
translation.ko: 아빠랑 소파에 앉아서 피자 같은 걸 먹는 모습요

translation.en: Dad, l got to go, ok?
I am sorry I've been so angry.
I've left you alone in this.
Well, they say the first year is the hardest.
He likes the sound of your voice.
He likes my voice as well.
l thought he was like me, but he's not. He's like you.
translation.ko: 나 같을 줄 알았는데 아니야 널 닮았어

translation.en: Of course you're happy. How could you not be?
So, that's the last of it?
Bella could deliver as early as tomorrow.
If she's going to have any chance at all, she'll need more blood.
translation.ko: 지푸라기라도 잡아 보려면 피가 더 필요해

translation.en: You have to be at your strongest for her. We need to go tonight.
translation.ko: 벨라를 위해 강해져야지 오늘 밤에 갈 거야

translation.en: Sam won't hesitate. You will be slaughtered.
translation.ko: 샘이 망설임 없이 당신을 죽일 거라고요

translation.en: - That won't be enough. - We have no choice, Jacob.
translation.ko: - 그거로는 부족해요 - 어쩔 수 없어, 제이컵

translation.en: If there's anything we can do to save her, we have to try.
translation.ko: 벨라를 구할 수만 있다면 뭐든 해야지

translation.en: - You'd risk your lives for her? - Of course we would.
Bella's a part of our family now.
As strong as the one l was born into.
l know what l have to do.
We should phase, Jacob. We can't protect ourselves like this.
translation.ko: 변신해야 해, 제이컵 이대로는 못 당해

translation.en: They'll see it as a threat.
l want to talk! Be easier if l could hear you, too.
translation.ko: 대화를 하고 싶다! 너희도 말로 해 주면 편하겠는데

translation.en: - How's the new family working out? - You done?
translation.ko: - 새 가족은 맘에 들어? - 다 떠들었어?

translation.en: Not until l finish this. What do you mean?
translation.ko: - 매듭을 짓기 전에는 못 가 - 무슨 뜻이야?

translation.en: l want Sam to take back Leah and Seth.
translation.ko: 샘이 리아와 세스를 다시 받아 줬으면 해

translation.en: l want them safe. And l want this over.
translation.ko: 저 둘의 안전을 원한다 이것도 끝내고 싶고

translation.en: l need Sam to wait until Bella's been separated from the problem.
translation.ko: 벨라의 문제가 해결될 때까지 샘이 기다려 줘야겠어

translation.en: You mean till she's dead. Ease up, Paul.
translation.ko: - 죽을 때 말이군 - 살살 해, 폴

translation.en: Tell Sam that when the moment comes, I'll be the one to destroy it.
translation.ko: 샘한테 때가 되면 내가 그걸 없애겠다고 전해

translation.en: I am the only one who can.
Can't we come up with something just a little more classic?
Yeah, it's not like I am the one carrying a demon.
translation.ko: 그럼, 악마를 임신한 건 내가 아니잖아

translation.en: Why don't you tell Jacob what you've decided?
translation.ko: 제이컵한테 네가 정한 걸 말해 주지 그래?

translation.en: Rose is trying to talk Bella out of her baby names.
translation.ko: 벨라가 고른 아기 이름 때문에 로즈가 난리야

translation.en: Well, then I am on your side no matter what you picked.
translation.ko: 그럼 난 네가 뭘 골랐든 네 편 할게

translation.en: Ok, fine, that one's not awful.
Why don't you tell him the girl's name?
l was playing around with our moms' names.
translation.ko: 엄마들 이름을 이렇게 저렇게 섞어 봤어

translation.en: And it's unique, which certainly fits the situation.
Carlisle said the placenta must have detached.
translation.ko: 칼라일에게 말했더니 태반이 떨어진 것 같대

translation.en: - He's coming as fast as he can, but... - We'll have to do it.
translation.ko: - 빨리 온다고는 하시는데... - 우리가 해야 해

translation.en: Alice, get her out of here!
Save her! You've got to change her!
l can't, not whilst he's still in there. l got to get him out first.
translation.ko: 애가 안에 있는 동안은 안 돼 애부터 꺼내야 해

translation.en: Stay, Bella. Stay focused. Keep your heart beating.
translation.ko: 정신 차려, 벨라 정신 놓지 마 - 계속 심장이 뛰게 해 - 안 돼!
- 계속 심장이 뛰게 해 - 안 돼! 아기가 질식하려 해!

translation.en: l promise I am ok. Let me.
You deserve to live with this.
translation.ko: 넌 이 고통을 안고 살아야 마땅해

translation.en: You're not dead. You're not dead.
No, it will work. lt will work.
Come back to me, please, baby.
l don't care what he's done.
- He's still my son. - I am sorry, Billy.
l just thought you should know.
Suddenly, it's not the Earth holding you here.
translation.ko: 갑자기 땅이 아니라 다른 게 날 지탱하는 거야

translation.en: You would do anything, be anything she needs.
translation.ko: 그녀가 원한다면 뭐든 할 수 있고 뭐든 될 수 있지

translation.en: You're going to be all right.
l won't let them hurt my family.
If you kill her, you kill me.
translation.ko: 그 애를 죽이면 날 죽이는 거야

translation.en: Whoever a wolf imprints on can't be harmed.
translation.ko: 늑대가 각인된 상대는 절대 해칠 수 없죠

translation.en: - Maybe l was too late. - No, Edward.
translation.ko: 제가 너무 늦었나 봐요 아니야, 에드워드

translation.en: "The knots keep you at my side." "Upstairs, in corners."
Which is spelt with an "S," Sweet Bianca.
He's added a new member to his coven.
At least our dispute with the Cullens is over.
translation.ko: 적어도 우리와 컬렌가의 분쟁은 이제 막을 내리겠군

translation.en: Our dispute goes far beyond the fate of a mere human.
translation.ko: 우린 고작 한 인간의 운명 때문에 분쟁을 벌이는 게 아니야

translation.en: Why, brother, l thought you understood.

translation.ko: 내가 원하는 게 그들 손에 있거든
